website_summaries.verdict: A clean concealer that can do double duty as a foundation as well.
pros: Lightweight, creamy formula that doesn't settle into fine lines and has buildable coverage
Provides a dewy finish and is good for sensitive skin
cons: Not ideal for those looking for full coverage or for oily skin

customer_reviews.title: Great for people with dry skin and redness
customer_reviews.text: I have eczema and with the super dry skin combined with crazy inflammation that I get, it’s hard to find a foundation without looking like Death Valley by noon. On top of that, it’s extra hard trying to find a natural foundation that doesn’t contain tree nuts (allergy). This foundation is tree nut free and keeps my skin hydrated while minimizing the redness. Win!
customer_reviews.author: Daphne Fong

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Really not sure why people review sellers on a product page! However, seeing someone do that for this makeup got me to write a review... This is an amazing product. I’ve used it for several years and with severe skin sensitivities, this is the one product that my skin always loves. I can’t imagine life without it. I am just grateful that l, when I had almost given up on finding makeup that my skin could tolerate, I was able to find RMS Uncover-up. Smooth and not cake-y at all, it’s almost like a second skin (and I need a second skin!). I use a setting powder on top of it.
customer_reviews.author: Cellist

customer_reviews.title: Great under eye coverup
customer_reviews.text: I have dark areas under my eyes. This product really works to cover up that area. I also use it on brown spots. I was lucky to get a sample of this product first so I was able to match my skin tone before I bought the product. The product comes with an applicator but I just use a Q tip and blend it in with my fingers. Before I apply the concealer I use an under eye moisturizer. I am very happy with the product. The concealer stays on all day . Glad I found this company.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is phenomenal
customer_reviews.text: RMS products are pretty awesome and this concealer is no exception! It matches my complexion perfectly and blends really well. I use it for under-eye circles and they occasional blemish without foundation. I don’t like to wear much makeup so I just put it directly on my skin, brush on a little power and done. Because the ingredients are non-toxic I can feel good about it. I really love this stuff and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Elleinad

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Natural Makeup
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for natural makeup/concealer for forever and I came across this on a blog, found it on Amazon and decided to give it a try. It's a small container, which for the price seems expensive, but a little goes a long way and the coverage is great! I don't wear makeup everyday, but it's lasted me several months and I still have some left in the container. I do cover it with some mineral powder as it does feel a little moist without anything over it, especially when it's humid during the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Long

customer_reviews.title: Poor blendability
customer_reviews.text: My ideal color match would have been a shade in between 000 and 00. Unfortunately, this concealer moved around a lot and could not be set with powder. It looked patchy under the eyes and settled into my fine lines. Not worth the price point.
customer_reviews.author: S.E.C.

customer_reviews.title: Smooth application
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Because it has coconut oil and it’s cold the concealer isn’t oily or matte, it’s just smooth. But because it does have coconut oil it will break out some people but make sure to wash your face before applying it. And when the weather gets hot I’m sure it will become a bit oily but that will just add a dewy glow to your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product especially for the vegan enthusiasts
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product especially for the vegan enthusiasts. This color is equivalent to nc45 in mac, golden tan in Tarte. Goes on effortlessly but does wipe off easily.. for me that isn't a problem. Hides imperfections and essentuates your assets :)
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Wischhusen

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first due to size and cost but once I started using, I realized you do not need that much for full coverage. It went on smoothly and covered just as I wanted. Paired well with its powder. This is a keeper. Glad to have found this all natural product. End of day, I didn’t feel greasy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light and natural looking
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this item from RMS. With the right moisturizer, it is light and natural looking. It is not too oily or powdery. Also, I have sensitive skin and my eyes are irritated easily. I've had no irritation whatsoever while wearing the product around my eyes. I would recommend and even gift it.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: #1 cover up for a natural look
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but this product has compelled me. I don’t even usually like makeup where you have to apply using your fingers. This is truly like wearing nothing but gives natural coverage. I use it for blemishes or sun spots and under my eyes. It’s incredible. My second favorite is Vapour Beauty’s but this one wins in how long it lasts!
customer_reviews.author: Pilar

customer_reviews.title: Not good for dry or mature skin
customer_reviews.text: The product looks fine when you first apply it, but after an hour or two, it is scaly and makes the undereye area look worse than before.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Creamy
customer_reviews.text: Love this concealer for mature skin. Just wish it had better staying power.
customer_reviews.author: D. Riehl

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This is not great for the $$$. Have found cheaper that work far better. Hard to apply, and weird shade.
customer_reviews.author: TF

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I admire the maker of this product for trying to create makeup with safe ingredients. However, it just isn't good. It creases so bad. I ended up just throwing it away. This makeup line is so expensive and has great reviews but it's a no for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vegan/cruelty free options are improving everyday!
customer_reviews.text: This is a light concealer: it’s buildable. If you are looking for heavy coverage, keep searching. This is perfect for anyone who likes a lightweight look. Four stars for the smell- something is a bit off.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Sort of greasy feeling
customer_reviews.text: The container is small but if you only use it for under eyes it will last. Goes on a bit greasy and can get wiped off pretty easily. May be better for other skin types
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: Works great, covers redness, clean makeup
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for “clean” foundation that would look even across my face and cover up redness. So glad to have found it! My skin feels and looks healthier too. It takes a little longer to put on bc I dab it on and you have to build it up a bit but it’s worth it. It comes in a lip gloss looking container and I was concerned about how long it would last but I’ve had it for about 3 weeks now and it still has more than half left. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fab concealer
customer_reviews.text: RMS is a leader in clean makeup. This product is a gold standard for concealers. Product looks darker in tub than on skin. Easily blendable and moist.
customer_reviews.author: Barbtchr

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: The best ever love the consistency and the coverage is perfect for a natural look
customer_reviews.author: ElizabethD

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing product. I have very fair skin and the color of this is perfect. It covers really well with a brush and is a great price. So happy to have found it!
customer_reviews.author: Faith Collins

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this but evidently my skin doesn't like coconut oil
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this but evidently my skin doesn't like coconut oil. The coverage was as expected. Light. Didn't find the coverage buildable but that's what I expected. Wish is had worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: S. E. Shout

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It really covers up my light blue hue under my eyes. Brighten up area as well!
customer_reviews.author: Caboose

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Covers up under eye dark circles perfectly and has a natural look. Doesn’t cake in fine lines.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Koenigsberger

customer_reviews.title: safe and trusted concealer
customer_reviews.text: So happy with my purhcase. I use shade 44. Love the fact that it doubles up as a handy spot concealer or as base founddation, though I generally apply lightky to needed areas only vs whole face, when using it as a foundatioj as the its quite creamy.
customer_reviews.author: GENEVIEVE GASPER

customer_reviews.title: Great for people who can don’t get broken out by coconut oil.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this concealer until it started making me break out really bad in the exact spots I put it on. I later learned that some people break out easily from products made mainly with coconut oil. So if you don’t have that issue, it’s definitely a great concealer.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Great texture and coverage
customer_reviews.text: This is am amazing concealer. I use an oval brush, which works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Such a great product!
customer_reviews.text: Will buy again and again! Doesn't get stuck in fine lines and really helps cover my dark under eye circles! Not a heavy product but also not a "full" thick coverage. More like a soft daily wearable product.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Marie

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic natural concealer
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic natural concealer. Since it's coconut oil based, it does tend to stay just a bit oily, which can easily be remedied with some powder. With that said, it provide fantastic coverage, goes on very smooth, and has no non-toxic chemicals. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S.D.

customer_reviews.title: Product does not open - lid made incorrectly
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I was not able to open my product, which I usually love. I've had it at my house as a back up and just tried to open it when my other product found out only to learn that this jar is faulty and the lid was put on askew/impossible to open :( I've never had this problem buying from other retailers, just Beautyhabit.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! Its smooth, soft, the color matches my skin perfect (00) but doesn't cover my dark circles well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good concealer, average foundation
customer_reviews.text: Good product. It is a quality concealer, but less so of a foundation. It also is quite small, so if you use it as concealer and foundation it will run out quickly
customer_reviews.author: Piper

customer_reviews.title: RMS IS THE BEST!!
customer_reviews.text: i LOVE RMS products! They are smooth, clean, healthy for your skin. The color selection is endless. I have reordered the foundation/concealer so many times!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: color was good match but it would not stay on my face. had to reapply frequently during day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: Product hardens and is difficult to use especially on thin sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: What's not to love?
customer_reviews.text: This is creamy and amazing. My new go-to concealer. Others have left me dry and this is moisturizing and perfect.
customer_reviews.author: leigh lachman

customer_reviews.title: ... acne bumps however probably worth it because of the good ingredients it has
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to get full coverage if you have acne bumps however probably worth it because of the good ingredients it has, I feel good knowing that this makeup isn't irritating my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love to use it. Its gives me a natural look and i love it because its made from organic materials
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hides a multitude of imperfections
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product before, so it is stillgreat
customer_reviews.author: Margaret W. Urbinato

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for really really pale people (such as yours truly)
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for really really pale people (such as yours truly). I've been trying to transition to organic beauty products, but found that Vapour's foundations pulled too orange on me and gave me a too-dewy finish. This stays far more matte and can be used as a foundation for full coverage! Overall, worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Lipshultz

customer_reviews.title: Great clean beauty product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product I not only use as concealer but all over my face as needed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got wrong color and I didn’t realized it until I ...
customer_reviews.text: Got wrong color and I didn’t realized it until I opened the box... By then, it was too late to return it...
customer_reviews.author: Leoni

customer_reviews.title: It is no better than any other less expensive concealer that I have used
customer_reviews.text: It is no better than any other less expensive concealer that I have used. The color is not quite right for my skin tone- I am fair skinned and the "fair" shade is too light for me. It did not blend well for me and looked a little cakey. I have this experience with a lot of concealers (but not all, so I don't think it's my technique) so it is just okay. I hate to waste so I will just use in a pinch when I am out of my other one.
customer_reviews.author: dsco10

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Sensitive, Dry Skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff - this is actually my second jar. I have very acne-prone, dry, sensitive skin and I’ve never had any problems with breakouts or irritation when I use this. Actually, with all of the nutrients in the formula I feel like my skin IMPROVES when I wear this foundation. Have recommended to all of my friends, and I would absolutely recommend it here too. I just wouldn’t recommend it as an under-eye concealer (unless you are somehow blessed with zero fine lines or wrinkles) as it can settle into those cracks if you’re not careful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love this. The bloggers
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this. The bloggers, cult following, and higher price tag had me thinking it would be the best thing since sliced toast. It doesn’t stay put or all day. It migrates in the weirdest way. 00 is really yellow tinged too. Tried a brush, fingers and beauty blender. No change.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy L Verratti

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: RMS Beauty Un Cover-Up is wonderful for covering under eye circles. It goes on smoothly and blends easily.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage!!
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this. I’m a licensed master esthetician and I struggle with foundation. I’m 50 with clog prone skin and the coverage is buildable, doesn’t flake, and it doesn’t ball up. I have access to many brands, and I really like this so far for my crazy, oily, yet dehydrated, clog prone, flakey skin.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Forkenbrock

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: It's sheer, so wear it for your light days or pair with a fuller coverage foundation. I keep one in my desk at work to touch up late in the day. You can layer it for fuller coverage too - very natural look. I need a little translucent powder in my t-zone to keep me from being shiny - it does the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Imani

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Moisturizing, doesnt cake up or crack. Seems to cover my dark circles nicely with a small amount of product. Blends very well. I hate wearing make up and dont except undereye concealer- ive tried a few and I have very sensitive dry skin so finding one that works can be hard. Glad I came across this
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Splurge...
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my RMS products, especially this all natural concealer (that can also be used as a foundation in a pinch). It covers discoloration very well, and this product will last a very long time!
customer_reviews.author: musicmuse

customer_reviews.title: After much trial and error, I found my concealer ...
customer_reviews.text: After much trial and error, I found my concealer, foundation, and general miracle-worker. I keep one pot at home and one at work, because yes I do reapply before going on the town sometimes. It really is worth the price, and lives up to all the hype.
customer_reviews.author: Sare

customer_reviews.title: Really like it, I meant to get one shade darker ...
customer_reviews.text: Really like it, I meant to get one shade darker but this one is working for now. It's not like traditional makeup, but totally worth the change. Very light coverage, but effective for a natural look.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product with moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order of this product. Just as described, it gives great coverage with moisturizing feel. Easy to wear with less makeup on casual days, too. Travels easily.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Oily skin girls beware
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this bc it’s so natural! But within 1-3 hours it was gone despite multiple applications. I’m super oily and combo skin and used primers and also tried solo. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: C and C

customer_reviews.title: I use as a foundation
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for three years now and I love it! I use it as my foundation and it provides great coverage and it’s sticky or blotchy. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mclaywell

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for such a small jar!
customer_reviews.text: This product for the price is very small. It was 39.00 I returned it .ugh
customer_reviews.author: ladylipstick

customer_reviews.title: Good product..creates a little
customer_reviews.text: I like the naturalness of the product. Creases a little..color was too light for me..I mix it with another color for skin matching
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You'll love it
customer_reviews.text: I really love this concealer. I'm amazed that it's all natural! I only use it as an undereye concealer, but it could be used as a foundation. It lasts me about 6 months with Daily use. And I always use my ring finger to apply. It seems to go on better when it's warm.
customer_reviews.author: Koalabear14

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: RMS products are wonderful! They do not irritate, stay put and are very natural.
customer_reviews.author: Life's Adventure

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: very light coverage if that is what you are looking for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally, truly pale makeup
customer_reviews.text: Truly pale color, which is what I needed. This cover-up is definitely more of a spot cover, rather than all over foundation. It's very moisturizing, too. I'd love to see RMS Beauty make a one-step cream-to-powder foundation.
customer_reviews.author: hannaberry78

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't go without my rms in cover up, it's a staple in makeup bag
customer_reviews.author: olive

product_meta.title: Un Cover-Up All Natural Concealer and Foundation – RMS Beauty Foundation and Concealer – Organic Ingredients – Easy Application (11.5)
feature_bullets: UNCOVER UP – (11.5) a buff beige with neutral undertones. “un” cover-up doubles as concealer and light foundation for minimal coverage to even out your skin tone.

REVEAL & ENHANCE – rms “un” cover-up is formulated to reveal and enhance healthier looking skin…not just cover it up. Lightweight and hydrating, this concealer minimizes the appearance of pores and rejuvenates your skin.
ORGANIC INGREDIENTS – This natural concealer contains coconut oil, beeswax, cocoa butter, jojoba oil, and more organic ingredients, and is GMO-free, gluten-free, soy-free, and cruelty-free.
SELF ADJUSTING - "un" cover-up colors will self adjust to your skin tone if they are not an exact match due to the mineral pigments used.

EASY APPLICATION –Apply sparingly with fingers over the T-zone area or wherever any extra coverage is desired. Skin-to-skin application is preferable for better blending, can also use a foundation brush.
